events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but want to return it because it doesn't fit and I would like a refund.
System has classified the customer inquiry as related to a refund request based on keywords in the message.
The support case has been assigned to agent Alex for further handling of the refund issue.
Hello! I’m Alex from customer support. I’m here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is too small and I prefer to get a refund instead of an exchange.
Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated your refund request. You should expect the money back in 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick help! That sounds good. I appreciate you making this easy to handle.
The refund case has been marked as resolved on our end. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund successfully. Feel free to reach out if there are any issues.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on the support you received.
